name: Hotel Belle Vue
overview: Hotel Belle Vue is a hotel located in the south of France. It is situated at 11 Rue du Port, in the Vieux-Port district of Marseille. Its location is famous for Marseille's historic port area, its restaurants, and its boutique shops. The hotel offers modern and stylish rooms, a fully equipped fitness center, and a terrace bar with panoramic Vieux-Port views. Additionally, Hotel Belle Vue also offers private studio apartments, which are suitable for family or friends vacations.

name: Motel Raffaello
overview: Motel Raffaello is a motel located in Rome, the capital of Italy. It is situated at Via Urbana, 3 and is within close proximity to major tourist attractions such as the Colosseum and the Roman Forum. The motel offers modern and comfortable rooms, a 24-hour front desk, and a rich breakfast buffet. Additionally, the motel's rooftop terrace provides guests with unforgettable views of Rome.

name: Mavi Panorama Resort
overview: Mavi Panorama Resort is a luxurious resort located in the heart of Antalya, offering stunning views of the city and the Mediterranean Sea.

rooms.name: Deluxe Suite

rooms.name: Family Suite
rooms.description: Perfect for families, our family suite comes with two bedrooms, two bathrooms and a spacious living room with a private balcony.

name: Sakura Ryokan
overview: Sakura Ryokan is a traditional Japanese-style ryokan located in Suginami, a district of Tokyo, Japan. The hotel is situated at 2 Chome-6-23 Minamiogikubo and is within walking distance of Inokashira Park, one of the most popular destinations in the area. The hotel features a restaurant serving Japanese cuisine and sweets, a classic Japanese bath, and a spacious garden.
